name: file-processing
description: This starter project consists of: * serverless.template - an AWS CloudFormation Serverless Application Model template file for declaring your Serverless functions and other AWS resources * Function.cs - class file containing the C# method mapped to the single function declared in the template file * aws-lambda-tools-defaults.json - default argument settings for use with Visual Studio and command line deployment tools for AWS

scripts.build: dotnet restore && dotnet lambda package --configuration release --framework netcoreapp2.1 --output-package bin/release/netcoreapp2.1/deploy-package.zip
